Class BattleController

extends Object

        Creates new BattleController.

        uiManager - UI manager in use.

        player - Current player.

      • handleItemUse

        public BattleState handleItemUse(GameCharacter target,
                                 Item item)
        Handles usage of an item in combat.
        Parameters:
        target - GameCharacter being targeted with an item.
        item - Item currnetly being used.
        Returns:
        current BattleState derived from updateGameState.
